Text.Page:
The Hands of Velika want to prove our worth in the fight against evil. Today we're looking to make a dent in {@Rgn:9002#Azarel's Labyrinth}.

Talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} if you want to aid in the cause.

You're a federation soldier, obviously, so this is a little sneaky of us.

Basically, we'd like you to take out a bunch of monsters in the labyrinth, and let the Hands of Velika take the credit. It would be really good for our reputation, er, cause.

What do you say?

{@Rgn:9002#Azarel's Labyrinth} is crawling with weird monsters, right?

I wouldn't last a minute in that labyrinth. But you work for me, so it's just like I did it, right?

Plus, Elthienne will make sure you get paid. Win-win.
Take out {@LinkCreature:9#1400#Azarel's juggernauts} in {@Rgn:9002#Azarel's Labyrinth} and bring back proof of their deaths.

Thanks for all you've done for us, . You've become a real friend to the Hands. It means a lot.

Elthienne has your payment, as usual.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:9#1410#Labyrinthine stalkers} in {@Rgn:9002#Azarel's Labyrinth} and bring back proof of their deaths.

Thank you, . This means so much to the Hands of Velika. Your service to us is invaluable.

Invaluable or no, here's your payment for a job well done, as usual.
